long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ü§ñ Handy AI Copilot - Your All-in-One AI Assistant

Transform your browsing experience with Handy AI Copilot, a powerful browser extension that puts advanced AI capabilities at your fingertips.

Key Features:
‚ú® Chat with AI Models
‚Ä¢ Support for latest OpenAI models (GPT-4, GPT-3.5, etc.)
‚Ä¢ Visual input support - paste or upload images for AI analysis
‚Ä¢ Markdown-formatted responses with syntax highlighting
‚Ä¢ Code block support with one-click copy functionality

üéØ Customizable System Prompts
‚Ä¢ Create and save multiple custom system prompts
‚Ä¢ Easy switching between different prompts for various use cases
‚Ä¢ Manage your prompt library with an intuitive interface

üé® AI Image Generation
‚Ä¢ Generate images using Replicate API
‚Ä¢ Simple toggle between text and image generation modes
‚Ä¢ Download generated images with one click

‚öôÔ∏è Advanced Settings
‚Ä¢ Configure OpenAI and Replicate API keys
‚Ä¢ Select preferred AI models
‚Ä¢ Flexible system prompt management
‚Ä¢ Save and manage all your preferences locally

üí° Perfect for:
‚Ä¢ Developers needing quick code assistance
‚Ä¢ Content creators seeking AI writing help
‚Ä¢ Designers wanting quick image generation
‚Ä¢ Anyone looking for an AI-powered productivity boost

üîí Privacy-Focused:
‚Ä¢ All API keys and settings stored locally
‚Ä¢ No data collection or tracking
‚Ä¢ Your conversations stay private

Get started with Handy AI Copilot today and experience the future of AI-assisted browsing!

Note: 
1. Requires OpenAI API key for chat features or Replicate API key for image generation.
2. Use "Use Replicate API for image generation" checkbox in Setting page to switch between OpenAI Model/Replicate Model
